Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/115th
ShortDescription: Southbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Southbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western-OH. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western (O'Hare Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
